scripts.build: npm run build-component && npm run transpile && npm run typecheck && npm run bundle && npm run copy-files
scripts.build-component: cd component && cargo component build --release --target wasm32-wasi
scripts.bundle: for source in worker.ts parse.ts print.ts; do esbuild --bundle --format=esm src/$source --outdir=dist; done
scripts.clean: rm -rf component/src/bindings.rs component-built dist && echo '## you will need to run `cargo clean` seperately to delete cargo artifacts'
